DOC.brief_title: Selinexor Treatment Advanced Relapsed/Refractory Squamous Cell Carcinomas
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , open-label , single-arm Phase 2 study SINE selinexor give orally patient diagnose advanced SCC head neck , lung , esophagus experience relapse and/or metastasis follow multiple prior chemotherapy treatment ( < 2 line therapy ) . Patients receive fixed dos selinexor tablet twice weekly 28-day cycle . Patients may continue one cycle next without interruption along criterion meet reason discontinuation occur .
